title: Calories in a Small Avocado
meta_description: Discover calories in a small avocado, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, fiber, and healthy fat details for easy tracking.
assumptions: Small Hass avocado (~100 g edible flesh, raw, pitted and peeled; California variety).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing region, and portion size. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A small avocado offers about 160 kcal, mostly from healthy fats, with 7 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp lime juice and salt
Mash into guacamole with 1 tbsp onion and tomato

faqs.q: How many calories in a small avocado?
faqs.a: Approximately 160 kcal for one small avocado (100 g flesh).

faqs.q: Is a small avocado low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, about 8.5 g total carbs, but 6.7 g is fiber, netting ~2 g.

faqs.q: What are the healthy fats in a small avocado?
faqs.a: Around 14.7 g total fat, mostly monounsaturated, with 2.1 g saturated.
A small one has about 2 g protein, making it a modest source.

faqs.q: How does avocado size affect calories?
faqs.a: Small (~100 g) is 160 kcal; medium (~150 g) around 240 kcal; adjust by weight.
